job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: strongDo you believe that creators should have the ability to get paid for the value they give to their fansbrbrstrongWe do which is why were building Patreon a platform that powers membership services for creators with established followings Patreon strives to provide creators with insight education and tools that make it possible to retain creative control while running their creative business so creators can focus on creating and energizing their fanbasesbrbrWe have payed out over 500 million directly to creators on our platform this year alone and our user base has doubled In order to support this level of growth we are looking for astrong Data ScientistbrbrstrongstronguWhat You Will Dobrustrongulli Shape Patreon product strategy within our member experience and content consumption teams counseling our product teams on defining success criteria designing experiments and measuring product efficacy lili Partner with teams across Patreon to inform strategy and evaluate success lili Build a culture of datadriven decision making at Patreon lili Dive into data to illuminate trends and answer key questions about our users lili Constantly improve our team practices and efficiency lili Work with people from all walks of life brliulstronguSkills And Experience You Possessbrustrongulli You have 3 years experience helping product teams make great decisions with data lili You have solid analytical thinking  you ask the right questions and can frame data correctly lili You are an expert querying large datasets lili You are comfortable in Python and relevant data libraries pandas numpy and know how to manipulate data in Excel lili You have a strong understanding of experimentation and statistical analysis lili You can crisply communicate complicated information in charts and dashboards lili You are an expert communicator with a love for clarity brliulstrongProjects you may work onbrstrongulli Content consumption Working with our content consumption team to evaluate the way in which members view and engage with content to drive member retention lili Mobile Evaluating and improving the performance of our mobile apps lili Community Helping build next generation products that connect creators and the fans they love and enable them to offer seamless community integrations brliulstronguWhat You Will Have The Chance To Learnbrustrongulli Advanced technical skills in SQL and Python data visualisation and data infrastructure lili Learn from an energetic Data Science team full of passion for our product and teams of Product Managers Designers and Engineers who are building the product brliulstronguWho Youll Work WithbrbrustrongAt Patreon youll join a highperforming and highlyempathetic team of people who proudly work on fulfilling our mission of funding the creative class Our culture of creatorfirst thoughtful teammates keeps work creative stretching and rewardingbrbrstronguOur Core BehaviorsbrustrongulliPut Creators First Patreon is nothing without our creators liliAchieve Ambitious Outcomes Set measure and accomplish goals that deliver massive value to our creators and patrons liliCultivate Inclusion We want an environment that retains and engages the diverse teams we buildliliBias Towards Action When in doubt we take the next best step then course correct when needed We go out of our way to fix problems when we see them We take ownership seriouslyliliBe Candid and Kind Be extremely caring and extremely direct in all you do at Patreon especially when it comes to giving positive and constructive feedback liliBe Curious You dont know it all and thats the fun part Everything gets better when youre curious Things get more interesting more clear and more approachable When you bring curiosity into the workplace youre growing yourself your teammates and Patreon as a wholebrliulstrongWant to Learn More About PatreonbrstrongulliCheck out TechCrunchs article about our focus on membership liliListen to our CEO Jack and CoFounder Sam chat with Guy Raz on NPRs How I Built This liliCheck to see if you know a Patreon teammate on LinkedInliul
